Text:
thanks for uploading such a useful material.
Does it contains the "Carrion Crown Map Folio"? I'm searching for this and can't find it anywhere.
Nope, it does not contain that pdf. You can copy the images from Carrion Crown APs and paste them in Paint.
These torrents are fantastic! Thank you!
Need some seeds...or a link to a newer one.
there is a LOT of material here, it seems complete and so far all the PDF files work.. great torrent. will seed for a while
Unfortunately this release is no longer up to date. 2nd part of Jade Regent & Feast of Ravenmoor are missing. I'll wait for the October releases coming out on 26th & create new torrent.
This is what DnD 4th Edition should have been.
